00040 void printUsage()
00041 {
00042     cerr << "Usage: ./jma_split_sentnece INPUT OUTPUT --encode [eucjp,sjis,utf8] --config CONFIG_PATH" << endl;
00043 }

00048 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00049 {
00050     if(argc < 7)
00051     {
00052         printUsage();
00053         exit(1);
00054     }
00055 
00056     // check command option "--encode"
00057     if(strcmp(argv[3], "--encode") != 0)
00058     {
00059         cerr << "unknown command option " << argv[3] << endl;
00060         printUsage();
00061         exit(1);
00062     }
00063 
00064     Knowledge::EncodeType encode = Knowledge::decodeEncodeType(argv[4]);
00065     if(encode == Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_NUM)
00066     {
00067         cerr << "unknown encode type " << argv[4] << endl;
00068         printUsage();
00069         exit(1);
00070     }
00071 
00072     // check command option "--config"
00073     if(strcmp(argv[5], "--config") != 0)
00074     {
00075         cerr << "unknown command option " << argv[5] << endl;
00076         printUsage();
00077         exit(1);
00078     }
00079     // save config file name
00080     const char* senConfig = argv[6];
00081 
00082     // create factory
00083     JMA_Factory* factory = JMA_Factory::instance();
00084 
00085     // create analyzer and knowledge
00086     Analyzer* analyzer = factory->createAnalyzer();
00087     Knowledge* knowledge = factory->createKnowledge();
00088 
00089     // set encoding
00090     knowledge->setEncodeType(encode);
00091 
00092     // below lines are commented out, as no dictionary is loaded
00093     //knowledge->setSystemDict(sysdict);
00094     //knowledge->addUserDict(userdict);
00095     //int result = knowledge->loadDict();
00096 
00097     // load configure file
00098     int result = knowledge->loadSentenceSeparatorConfig(senConfig);
00099     if(result == 0)
00100     {
00101         cerr << "fail to load config file: " << senConfig << endl;
00102         exit(1);
00103     }
00104 
00105     // set knowledge
00106     analyzer->setKnowledge(knowledge);
00107 
00108     // open files
00109     const char* source = argv[1];
00110     const char* dest = argv[2];
00111     assert(source && dest);
00112 
00113     ifstream from(source);
00114     if(! from)
00115     {
00116         cerr << "error in opening file: " << source << endl;
00117         exit(1);
00118     }
00119 
00120     ofstream to(dest);
00121     if(! to)
00122     {
00123         cerr << "error in opening file: " << dest << endl;
00124         exit(1);
00125     }
00126 
00127     // split sentences
00128     string line;
00129     vector<Sentence> sentVec;
00130     while(getline(from, line))
00131     {
00132         sentVec.clear();
00133         analyzer->splitSentence(line.c_str(), sentVec);
00134         for(size_t i=0; i<sentVec.size(); ++i)
00135         {
00136             string str(sentVec[i].getString());
00137             trimSelf(str);
00138             if(!str.empty())
00139                 to << str << endl;
00140         }
00141     }
00142 
00143     // destroy instances
00144     delete knowledge;
00145     delete analyzer;
00146 
00147     return 0;
00148 }
